// Basic geolocation utility
export function getCurrentPosition(){let options=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{if(!navigator.geolocation){reject(new Error('Geolocation is not supported by this browser.'));}else{navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(resolve,reject,options);}});}export async function getLocation(){const position=await getCurrentPosition();return{latitude:position.coords.latitude,longitude:position.coords.longitude};}
